com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity

Class ErpServiceUriBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity.ErpServiceUriBuilder

  • public class ErpServiceUriBuilder
extends Object
    Used to build S/4HANA service URI, considering parameters, such as base URI, relative path, S/4HANA edition (Cloud or On-Premise).
